summary: This bill, the Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Reauthorization Act of 2025, focuses on improving weather forecasting and prediction capabilities. It reauthorizes the Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Act of 2017, addresses topics like public safety, hurricane and tornado forecasting, tsunami warnings, and commercial weather data. It introduces programs for weather innovation, data collection, and communication, including enhancing NOAA Weather Radio and modernizing the Advanced Weather Interactive Processing System. The bill also covers improving weather information for agriculture and water management, including drought monitoring and soil moisture programs.
